publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1599 Bill Aitken: The Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2008—That the Parliament recommends that nothing further be done under the Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/125).

S3M-1599 Bill Aitken: The Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2008—That the Parliament recommends that nothing further be done under the Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standards Conditions) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/125).
